definition: to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: Considerable attention is given to the action of centrifugal force in grinding wheels.
sentences.chinese: 磨床砂轮的离心力作用受到相当的关注。

sentences.english: The spin-drier use centrifugal force to made the cloth dry.
sentences.chinese: 甩干机用离心力让衣服变干。

sentences.english: Centrifugal force increases the quality of the satellite is receding gradually strong reason.
sentences.chinese: 卫星的质量增大离心力渐强是退行原因。

sentences.english: Centrifugal force pushes it toward the point furthest, away from the point of rotation.
sentences.chinese: 离心力会把汤甩向最远的一点，远离旋转点。

sentences.english: In this paper, the deformation effects of the elastic Earth caused by the rotational centrifugal force are discussed;
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了弹性地球在自转离心力作用下的形变效应。

sentences.english: Under the impact of the centrifugal force, honey comes out of the cells and flows down the walls of the extractor.
sentences.chinese: 在离心力的作用下，蜂蜜从蜂板上脱离，落入萃取器。

sentences.english: The magma accumulates around the Equator, due to the centrifugal force of rotation.
sentences.chinese: 由于地球自转的离心力，岩浆在赤道处聚集起来。

sentences.english: Suitable for conveying sensitivity and vulnerability to centrifugal force and other items damaged items.
sentences.chinese: 适合输送敏性物品和易受离心力等破坏的物品。

sentences.english: Specialism enhances the centrifugal forces in society.
sentences.chinese: 专业化加大了社会的离心力。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, a measure is taken to reduce the action of centrifugal force.
sentences.chinese: 同时提出了减小离心力作用的方法。
